website_summaries.verdict: Unlike other signature shoes like the LeBron 16 from Nike, this classic silhouette receives mixed reactions from wearers. Some are thrilled about the comeback of the Reebok Answer DMX, with all its updates and its familiar features. Then again, other became quite skeptical about some details on its new look. Nevertheless, most fans agree that these sneakers offer comfort and durability that is well worth its price tag.
pros: Based on the opinions of a few wearers, the Reebok Answer DMX has a super comfortable fit
The stylish look of this sneaker is lauded by most who tested it
A certain reviewer commends the thick leather that encompasses the upper of this Reebok basketball shoe
Majority of the users are requesting Reebok to bring this shoe back
One of the most noticed feature of this basketball shoe is its moving-air technology, which is well reviewed by many of its users
cons: One user was disappointed about the gold accents on the new Reebok Answer DMX, but say it is no deal breaker
A certain user said the technology of this shoe only worked for a few weeks

customer_reviews.title: "The answer" would definetly approve!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are so cute! On the internal central part under laces there is a sentence in honor of "The answer" and his prize of rookie of the year and there are also his statistics of that year. Sincerely there are some spots that are little dirty or not perfect but without problems you can clean and adjust that to let the shoes be definetly perfect.. very nice article!..
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: AND THEY FIT JUST LIKE I REMEMBER
customer_reviews.text: HAD A PAIR OF THESE BACK IN THE DAY, AND THEY FIT JUST LIKE I REMEMBER..... PERFECT! I LOVE THEM AND THE FIT GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Thats what i exactly wanted. Hope i can buy from you guys again in the near future. Thanks again !!!

customer_reviews.title: Not DMX technology, yet nicely made
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice and comfortable, yet a little big. Now the DMX technology is not there. That really stinks, yet all in all the shoes are made well.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Medlock

customer_reviews.title: but im happy they still killin'em
customer_reviews.text: Came w a nick or 2 tho, but im happy they still killin'em...

customer_reviews.title: great seller and shoe
customer_reviews.text: Received my shoes before delivered date, great seller and shoe. Will be ordering again

customer_reviews.title: I bought them for my grandson because he wanted them.  He said the style of the sneaker is so big.  I decided to keep them .
customer_reviews.text: The reason I kept them is because they are made very well. I think that he will began to like them.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size not what I expected but looks good, fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tennis shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Item were as expected. Nice color, material and design. it was a gift to my husband in his birthday. He loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite basketball kicks! It's perfect for athletes who play the no. 1 position. Great shoe for guards!

customer_reviews.title: real clean look just like the old pair i use to have as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in earlier than expected, real clean look just like the old pair i use to have as a kid. Couple glue spots but nothing you camt cover up or remove, definitely will be ordering another pair in the future
customer_reviews.author: austin jimenez

product_meta.title: Reebok Cl Leather Tech, Men’s Classic Lace-Up Half Shoe
product_meta.description: The Reebok Cl Leather Tech Athletic feature a Suede upper with a Round Toe. The Man-Made outsole lends lasting traction and wear.
feature_bullets: This shoes / sandals / boots style name or model number is The Answer Dmx 10
